amendment.description: To prohibit employees of the United States Postal Service from engaging in collective bargaining.

action.text: Amendment SA 2039 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 2000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2039, under the order of 4/19/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 23 - 76. Record Vote Number: 79.
